name: The Last Guard (StudioDonk)
description:
The Last Guard

You are the last standing line of defense to stop the kingdom from falling into chaos from a neve-rending horde of zombies! You will traverse around the castle walls and adventure into ruins to collect gold. But be aware, you can easily get overrun in tight spaces! You will be armed with the finest arsenal the kingdom has, but will it be enough? 

Controls

Movement - W,A,S,D

Shoot - Left mouse-click

Menu/Upgrade - Escape

Abilities - Not in game yet

Gold/Chests

Chests spawn in 5 locations on the map (Top Right Corner, The bottom below the center runes and each of the structures.) collection a chest will initially give the player 50 gold which is increased by 50 gold every 30 seconds. Gold is used to upgrade the players power, however in the current build only attack speed is available.
